Description: Red granite obelisk bearing name of Hatshepsut; repaired from three pieces.
Curator's comments: Published: C. Ziegler, The Pharaohs, Venice 2002, p.414 [70].
Exhibition history: 2002 8 Sept-2003 25 May, Venice, Palazzo Grassi, Les Pharaons 2022 21 Jun-31 Oct, Marseille, MUCEM Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations, Pharaoh Superstars 2022-2023 24 Nov-6 Mar, Lisbon, Calouste Gulbenkian Museum, Pharaoh Superstars
